alert.note: Alert for Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 02 at 8:09AM MST until March 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Areas near Dilkon and Kykotsmovi. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 8 AM Today to 11 AM Today: Dilkon 0 to 1 inches Kykotsmovi 0 to 1 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
